categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: The Star Wars: First Draft was the first revision to the rough draft, completed only a few months later. Most of the revision centered on names, and many of these changes were later rejected when George Lucas began work on the second draft, entitled Adventures of the Starkiller, Episode I: The Star Wars, in early 1975.
Changes from the Rough to the First Draft
Because so many changes were made to the names in the script, the original names from the rough draft are indicated below.
